TopicTitle: "menu open" icon does not update if you open a part menu from right clicking on a part.

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: I9 CPU Intel | GPU: 3060 6 gb (laptop) | RAM: 16 GB

 

Video explains quite well but the ^ arrow does not show a window is open in the PAM if a part is opened via right click (part via flight view). But the options for the part are open. When clicking on the part in the PAM the arrow performs normally. I do this to two different parts to show it happens to everything.

 

Included Attachments:

KerbalSpaceProgram22023-10-2616-11-55.mp4
